price: ئایا جگە لە ڕۆژی دوایی چاوەڕوانی چی دەکەن کە کتوپڕ بێت بۆیان لەکاتێکدا ئەوان ھەست ناکەن
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
